commands.name: Echo
commands.desc: Repeats any text after the command.

commands.name: Opgg
commands.desc: Sends a summary of the specified player's League of Legends OP.GG page.

commands.name: Purge
commands.desc: Removes the specified number of messages from the chat.

commands.name: Info
commands.desc: Replies with bot information such as the token.

commands.name: ListServers
commands.desc: Displays a list of all servers the bot is currently active in.

commands.name: Announce
commands.desc: Announces the following message to all channels named bot_announcements. Uses " : " as a split for title and description and \n as a new field.
